title: 풀스택 웹 개발 (선임 개발자)
description: 인벤 KR의 각종 신규 프로젝트를 진행 및 시스템 유지보수를 진행하였습니다.
details: Designed template UIs and design systems in Figma.
Converted UIs into responsive HTML and CSS with a mobile-first approach.
Created custom illustrations and item description banners.
Provided detailed documentation and customer support on GitHub.
Engaged with users to address setup inquiries, bug issues, and feedback.

blog.title: Studio by Mailchimp
blog.description: Produce professional, reliable streams easily leveraging Mailchimp's innovative broadcast studio.
